annotations.pod-security.kubernetes.io/audit-violati: would violate PodSecurity "restricted:v1.24": allowPrivilegeEscalation != false (container "fedora" must set securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation=false), unrestricted capabilities (container "fedora" must set securityContext.capabilities.drop=["ALL"]), runAsNonRoot != true (pod or container "fedora" must set securityContext.runAsNonRoot=true), seccompProfile (pod or container "fedora" must set securityContext.seccompProfile.type to "RuntimeDefault" or "Localhost")
annotations.securitycontextconstraints.admission.ope: "anyuid" is most restrictive, not denied, and chosen over "restricted-v2" because "anyuid" has higher priority
